commit.message:
Expose node relay fee settings in help, independent of -help-debug

-help-debug is used to hide "debugging options", and many of them are of
no use to the average user or node operator.

In contraast, fee settings are relevant to possibly emergent fee selection
behavior such as the lowering of minimum fees. Exposing these settings
in the help output increases their visibility and thus the possibility that
node operators will voluntarily reduce their fee requirements. Seems that
would be a fine thing, akin to volunteering computation and bandwidth.
